p: Having coronaviral principal protease (3CLpro) as the critical enzyme for SARS-CoV-2 replication and serine protease (TMPRSS211) for S protein priming has made these proteases attractive targets [ 140]. Thus, the existing protease inhibitors could be potential drug candidates targeting these enzymes [ 140]. Few antivirals were mentioned previously as having a 3CLpro inhibitory effect such as LPV and RTV.
